Keywords: Asgardian , Avengers , Celebrity , Deity
Real Name: Thor Odinson
Special Powers
PREPARE YOURSELVES FOR THE PARTY PRINCE, HUZZAH!: Willpower, but succeeds on a 4-6. When Party Thor uses it and succeeds, after resolutions you may heal him 1 click.
YOU NEED A TIMEOUT, BECAUSE YOU'RE A PARTY POOPER!: Pulse Wave. When Party Thor uses it, after resolutions you may give all hit characters an action token.

June 13, 2022
Oathful
Probably the most cost effective Thor we've gotten in a while, this guys Pulse Wave feels like old Incapacitate+. With his range only being 3 with his Pulse Wave, he'll A) be right in range to charge after he gets hit, and B) be able to avoid hitting his team easier than other characters. With how much he offers for only 50pts, it's highly likely he will be targeted first. Someone mentioned his synergy with Malekith from WoR, and I couldn't agree more. Thematic: 8/10 Viability: 9/10 Fun Factor: 8/10, fairly balanced figure
June 1, 2022
Disbeeme
Just imagine if you gave him super soldier serum. 3+ Willpower, RS/PWer with heals to boot!
June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
We love, love, love a character that tells you exactly how to play it and gives you the stats & powers to back that up. Party Thor doesn't actually want to hang with your force, he wants those nerds to stay three squares away while he pops a keg for the cool kids on the other side of the map. The more the merrier! His cheap cover charge leaves plenty of room for guests, and if the party turns ugly he transitions into a very competent brawler. His keywords are all top-shelf; he'll host ragers in Avengers Manor and the halls of Asgard, but he'll also be the life of the party in Westview and across the Spider-Verse (as a plus-one to either of the rare Mary Jane pieces). Seriously, a surprise top want of the set.
May 4, 2022
Goop
This guy is GREAT for only 50pts, yeah his damage is a bit low but you are likely going to be running shot pulse waving most of the time to knock your opponents off their top clicks. Solid reducers all the way down.
